documents: list of 3-5 most relevant document codes

relations.Subject: Albania
relations.Description: This country programme reflects the comparative advantages of UNDP in supporting national reforms and upholding values of justice, human rights, equity and gender equality, through coordinated multisectoral approaches that facilitate systemic reforms.

relations.Subject: Albania
relations.Description: In March 2020, the European Union opened accession negotiations. The country’s vision of sustainable development, the key drivers for reforms and political and public priorities, are accession to the European Union, sustainable economic growth and inclusive prosperity.

relations.Subject: UNDP
relations.Description: UNDP supports the aspirations of European Union to join the European Union and attain the outcomes of the United Nations Sustainable Development Cooperation Framework (UNSDCF).
